= Why =
In general, games need these fonts, especially *Windows exclusive* games.

In order to install these fonts, you must extract the ttfs and paste them in `/usr/share/fonts`


= Extracting Fonts = 
* Download a Windows ISO File. Check `My Passport/software/firmware` for the appropriate isos. 
* Install `p7zip` if not already installed
* Run the following commands on the ISO: 


{{{bash
7z e <WINDOWS 10 ISO> sources/install.wim
}}}

{{{bash
7z e install.wim 1/Windows/{Fonts/"*".{ttf,ttc},System32/Licenses/neutral/"*"/"*"/license.rtf} -ofonts/
}}}

{{{bash
7z e install.wim Windows/{Fonts/"*".{ttf,ttc},System32/Licenses/neutral/"*"/"*"/license.rtf} -ofonts/ ***REMOVED*** Windows 7
}}}

*The last command only needs to be run on Windows 7 ISO images.* 

= Installing =
* Now, there should be a *fonts* directory. From that directory, copy and paste all fonts to `/usr/share/fonts`.
* Then, run: 

{{{bash
sudo fc-cache -fv
}}}
